trends: There has been one other sighting in Deep River
There were no other sightings in Deep River on or around August 8th 1986
divs: Sighting Details3 oclock AM RIGHT AFTER ELECTRICAL STORM WE WRE IN LVINGROOM MY HUSBAND I and the two kids. all awoken by the storm. our son was sitting in the chair looking out the door window and stated its a world war, we looked out the window and the most beautiful colors were eminating in the sky suddenly our palor fan which was on high slowed down as if we wre looking at it through a strob light and the lights dimmed we went to the door and looked out it was dark then no colors and singular lights appeared like spotlights on the ground coming from above not 5 seconds later these lights slowly started to move in an oval we could see the road and tree line way across the street of course the kids wanted to go out and look up but we wre too scared and said no these lights lasted about a min and stopped turning went they stopped turning the fan speeded up and the lights became bright again. and then it was gone . the next day the paper stated that it was swamp gas. but the next two towns up seen the beautiful lights too it was in the Middletown Press and the New Haven Register papers. I was sorry we didnt go out now and we still talk about this UFO with each other to this day i forgot to say the ill call them spot lights must have been at least 100 this was very scary to us the papers said swamp gas but there was no way not with the rotating spot lights I know this is along time ago but this incident has haunted us all these years and i wanted to tell someone that wouldnt think we were crazy this thing was huge i think it was taking the power from the lines sorry im not a good writer NEENA
Summary: beautiful colors in sky then hundreds of light beams in circular motion hovering
